section.heroText:
Here is some text.
We'll have checks for length of statements

actionCard.actionText: Work in the outdoors with industry professionals and gain practical experience in numerous fields!
Support our local communities by donating your time or resources
Join YEP in providing engaging and meaningful projects to help our youth and community

testimonial.testimonialQuote: We hired a seasonal crew through the Youth Employment Program. They were a great help to each and every project we sent them on throughout the course of the summer(not real quote)

actionCard.actionText:
"I want to build myself and make money"

or

"I want to get paid in the Rocky Mountains
"I want to help our youth, and I have some free resources!"
"I want YEP to work on my projects!"

section.contactStatement: Want to learn more about YEP and all that we do?
